```{r}
upload_csvs <- function(){
  ## Specify directory
  directory <- "mturkfitbit_export_3.12.16-4.11.16/Fitabase Data 3.12.16-4.11.16"
  
  # Get list of CSV file names
  csv_files <- list.files(directory, pattern = "\\.csv$", full.names = TRUE)
  
  # Loop through each file
  for (file in csv_files) {
    # Extract the file name without extension to use as the variable name
    file_name <- gsub(".*/|\\.csv$", "", file)
    
    # Read the CSV file
    df <- read.csv(file)
    
    # Assign the dataframe to a variable with the file name
    assign(file_name, df, envir = .GlobalEnv)
  }
}

# Call the function to load CSVs
upload_csvs()
```
